00041 #define L4_TSC_INIT_AUTO             0 ///< Automatic init
00042 #define L4_TSC_INIT_KERNEL           1 ///< Initialized by kernel
00043 #define L4_TSC_INIT_CALIBRATE        2 ///< Initialized by user-level
00044

00046 extern l4_uint32_t l4_scaler_tsc_to_us;

00048 extern l4_uint32_t l4_scaler_tsc_linux;

00178 /* implementaion */
00179 
00180 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00181 l4_calibrate_tsc (l4_kernel_info_t *kip)
00182 {
00183   return l4_tsc_init(L4_TSC_INIT_AUTO, kip);
00184 }
00185 
00186 L4_INLINE l4_cpu_time_t
00187 l4_rdtsc (void)
00188 {
00189     l4_cpu_time_t v;
00190 
00191     __asm__ __volatile__
00192   ("        \n\t"
00193    ".byte 0x0f, 0x31    \n\t"
00194   /*"rdtsc\n\t"*/
00195   :
00196   "=A" (v)
00197   : /* no inputs */
00198   );
00199 
00200     return v;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /* the same, but only 32 bit. Useful for smaller differences,
00204    needs less cycles. */
00205 L4_INLINE
00206 l4_uint32_t l4_rdtsc_32(void)
00207 {
00208   l4_uint32_t x;
00209 
00210   __asm__ __volatile__ (
00211        ".byte 0x0f, 0x31\n\t" // rdtsc
00212        : "=a" (x)
00213        :
00214        : "edx");
00215 
00216   return x;
00217 }
00218 
00219 L4_INLINE l4_cpu_time_t
00220 l4_rdpmc (int nr)
00221 {
00222     l4_cpu_time_t v;
00223 
00224     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00225    "rdpmc       \n\t"
00226   :
00227   "=A" (v)
00228   : "c" (nr)
00229   );
00230 
00231     return v;
00232 }
00233 
00234 /* the same, but only 32 bit. Useful for smaller differences,
00235    needs less cycles. */
00236 L4_INLINE
00237 l4_uint32_t l4_rdpmc_32(int nr)
00238 {
00239   l4_uint32_t x;
00240 
00241   __asm__ __volatile__ (
00242        "rdpmc       \n\t"
00243        : "=a" (x)
00244        : "c" (nr)
00245        : "edx");
00246 
00247   return x;
00248 }
00249 
00250 L4_INLINE l4_uint64_t
00251 l4_tsc_to_ns (l4_cpu_time_t tsc)
00252 {
00253     l4_uint32_t dummy;
00254     l4_uint64_t ns;
00255     __asm__
00256   ("        \n\t"
00257    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00258    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00259    "movl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00260    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00261    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00262    "addl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00263    "adcl  $0, %%edx   \n\t"
00264    "shld  $5, %%eax, %%edx  \n\t"
00265    "shll  $5, %%eax   \n\t"
00266   :"=A" (ns),
00267    "=&c" (dummy)
00268   :"0" (tsc),
00269    "g" (l4_scaler_tsc_to_ns)
00270   );
00271     return ns;
00272 }
00273 
00274 L4_INLINE l4_uint64_t
00275 l4_tsc_to_us (l4_cpu_time_t tsc)
00276 {
00277     l4_uint32_t dummy;
00278     l4_uint64_t us;
00279     __asm__
00280   ("        \n\t"
00281    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00282    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00283    "movl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00284    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00285    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00286    "addl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00287    "adcl  $0, %%edx   \n\t"
00288   :"=A" (us),
00289    "=&c" (dummy)
00290   :"0" (tsc),
00291    "g" (l4_scaler_tsc_to_us)
00292   );
00293     return us;
00294 }
00295 
00296 L4_INLINE void
00297 l4_tsc_to_s_and_ns (l4_cpu_time_t tsc, l4_uint32_t *s, l4_uint32_t *ns)
00298 {
00299     l4_uint32_t dummy;
00300     __asm__
00301   ("        \n\t"
00302    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00303    "mull  %4      \n\t"
00304    "movl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00305    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00306    "mull  %4      \n\t"
00307    "addl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00308    "adcl  $0, %%edx   \n\t"
00309    "movl  $1000000000, %%ecx  \n\t"
00310    "shld  $5, %%eax, %%edx  \n\t"
00311    "shll  $5, %%eax   \n\t"
00312    "divl  %%ecx     \n\t"
00313   :"=a" (*s), "=d" (*ns), "=&c" (dummy)
00314   : "A" (tsc), "g" (l4_scaler_tsc_to_ns)
00315   );
00316 }
00317 
00318 L4_INLINE l4_cpu_time_t
00319 l4_ns_to_tsc (l4_uint64_t ns)
00320 {
00321     l4_uint32_t dummy;
00322     l4_cpu_time_t tsc;
00323     __asm__
00324   ("        \n\t"
00325    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00326    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00327    "movl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00328    "movl  %%edx, %%ecx    \n\t"
00329    "mull  %3      \n\t"
00330    "addl  %%ecx, %%eax    \n\t"
00331    "adcl  $0, %%edx   \n\t"
00332    "shld  $5, %%eax, %%edx  \n\t"
00333    "shll  $5, %%eax   \n\t"
00334   :"=A" (tsc),
00335    "=&c" (dummy)
00336   :"0" (ns),
00337    "g" (l4_scaler_ns_to_tsc)
00338   );
00339     return tsc;
00340 }
00341 
00342 L4_INLINE void
00343 l4_busy_wait_ns (l4_uint64_t ns)
00344 {
00345   l4_cpu_time_t stop = l4_rdtsc();
00346   stop += l4_ns_to_tsc(ns);
00347 
00348   while (l4_rdtsc() < stop)
00349     ;
00350 }
00351 
00352 L4_INLINE void
00353 l4_busy_wait_us (l4_uint64_t us)
00354 {
00355   l4_cpu_time_t stop = l4_rdtsc ();
00356   stop += l4_ns_to_tsc(us*1000ULL);
00357 
00358   while (l4_rdtsc() < stop)
00359     ;
00360 }
00361 
00362 EXTERN_C_END

00364 #endif /* __l4_rdtsc_h */
